Title: Research Memo-C2068
Text:
Date: [---]

They say the new control subject comes from a distant and mysterious underground galaxy. The intricate frequency fluctuations indeed align with the characteristics of the HÃ© civilization. Decoding is nearly finalized, and provided the validation of values proceeds seamlessly, I plan on activating these two Guide Crystals at the detection table on the hilltop tomorrow morning. I hope that this time, I can witness the bridge to another civilization.
